title.en: Cream Cheese Stuffed Baby Bell Pepper Appetizer
title.zh: 奶油奶酪填充嬰兒貝爾胡椒開胃

For 24 cents per serving, this recipe covers 3% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals.

It works well as a very reasonably priced side dish.
With a spoonacular score of 53%, this dish is pretty good.
Similar recipes include Cream Cheese Stuffed Baby Bell Pepper Appetizer, Cream Cheese Stuffed Baby Bell Peppers, and Cheese & Prosciutto Stuffed Baby Bell Peppers.
zh: 如果您有大約45分鐘的時間在廚房裡，那麼奶油奶酪填充的小胡椒開胃菜可能是一個很棒的麩質，乳酸乳膠素食和原始食譜可以嘗試。
該食譜將24份含43卡路里，1克蛋白質和4G脂肪的食譜。
對於每份24美分，此食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的每日需求的3％。
來自Goodista的食譜有82位粉絲。
如果您有核桃，小吃辣椒，蔥和其他一些食材，可以做到。
它可以很好地搭配價格合理的配菜。
這道菜的孢子分數為53％，非常好。
類似的食譜包括奶油奶酪餡嬰兒甜椒開胃菜，奶油奶酪填充的小辣椒以及奶酪和熏火腿填充小胡椒。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Cut the bell peppers lengthwise, remove the seeds and stems. Lightly oil the bell peppers by tossing them in a bowl with some grapeseed oil or olive oil. Place the peppers on a baking sheet skin-side down. Roast in the oven for 8-10 minutes until the edges begin to show some color. Remove from the oven and allow to cool.
Step 2: While the peppers are roasting, prepare your stuffing. Place the cream cheese, walnuts, garlic, salt, sriracha and black pepper in a bowl and mix until creamy (I used a fork to mash the ingredients together but Im sure this can be done in a food processor or mixer). Add the green onion and fold in to the cream cheese until combined. Test the cream cheese for flavor. If you would like, add more salt and/or sriracha.
Step 3: Heat your oven to 400 degrees. Use a spoon (or a piping bag) to stuff the peppers liberally and place them back on the baking sheet. There is enough stuffing here to really pack those suckers up, so you dont need to worry about the amount of cream cheese youre portioning out. If the cream cheese is very soft, place the baking sheet in the refrigerator for 15 minutes to allow it to set up. If not, place pop the peppers in the oven and bake about 8 minutes. Change oven setting to high broil and bake an additional 2 minutes, until the tops of the cream cheese begin to brown (If theyre already brown at this point, skip the broiling).
Step 4: Put on a pretty plate and serve to your friends.
zh: 步驟1：將烤箱預熱至350度。縱向切薄片，去除種子和莖。用一些葡萄籽油或橄欖油將辣椒扔在碗中，輕輕油脂。將辣椒放在烤盤上的皮膚側。在烤箱中烤8-10分鐘，直到邊緣開始顯示一些顏色。從烤箱中取出，冷卻。
步驟2：辣椒正在烘烤時，準備餡料。將奶油奶酪，核桃，大蒜，鹽，sriracha和黑胡椒放在碗中，然後混合直至奶油（我用叉子將食材搗碎在一起，但我敢肯定可以在食品加工機或攪拌機中完成）。加入綠色洋蔥，然後將其折疊到奶油奶酪中，直至混合。測試奶油奶酪的味道。如果願意，請添加更多鹽和/或Sriracha。
步驟3：將烤箱加熱到400度。用勺子（或管道袋）將辣椒自由地塞入烤盤上。這裡有足夠的餡料來真正打包那些吸盤，因此您不必擔心奶油奶酪的數量，您會分配。如果奶油奶酪非常柔軟，請將烤盤放在冰箱中15分鐘，以使其設置。如果不是，請將辣椒彈出放入烤箱中，然後烘烤約8分鐘。將烤箱設置為高烤肉，再烘烤2分鐘，直到奶油奶酪的頂部開始變成褐色（如果此時它們已經變成褐色，請跳過烤肉）。
步驟4：放在漂亮的盤子上，給您的朋友。

title.zh: 綠色玉米餅（綠色玉米餅）

instructions.en:
Step 1: Roast Chili Peppers Preheat broiler.
Step 2: Select firm, meaty peppers without wrinkles for roasting.
Step 3: Wash thoroughly.
Step 4: Place peppers evenly in a single layer on a foil-lined cookie sheet.
Step 5: Place under broiler.
Step 6: Watch them closely as the skin will blister and turn black within minutes.
Step 7: Turn the peppers after 5 minutes to blister all sides evenly.
Step 8: When done, the pepper skins should be evenly blistered and mostly black.
Step 9: Place roasted peppers in a plastic bag, cover with a kitchen towel and when cool, rub off blackened skin.
Step 10: Tear open and pull out the seed pod and stem.
Step 11: Sauce In a blender combine the peppers, flour, and half of the suero or buttermilk and blend until creamy.
Step 12: Pour mixture into medium skillet and set over medium-low heat to warm.
Step 13: Add additional suero or buttermilk and stir.
Step 14: Taste and season with salt, usually about 2 teaspoons.
Step 15: If the sauce is too spicy, add cup of crema or sour cream and stir.
Step 16: If the sauce is too thick, add water until desired consistency is reached.
Step 17: Chicken (Optional) In a pot with enough water to cover, boil chicken breasts 25 minutes or until juices run clear.
Step 18: Drain, cool, and shred.
Step 19: Optional time-saver: shred a store bought rotisserie chicken.
Step 20: Stacked Style Fry tortillas in hot oil until softened.
Step 21: Drain on paper towels.
Step 22: Soften tortillas by soaking in sauce one at a time.
Step 23: Place softened tortillas on individual serving plates.
Step 24: Layer with cooked chicken, cheese, and onion.
Step 25: Repeat process for a total of 3 tortillas for each serving.
Step 26: Oven Style Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Step 27: Spread 1 cup of the sauce in an ungreased 9-by-13-inch baking dish.
Step 28: Fry tortillas in hot oil just until softened.
Step 29: Drain on paper towels.
Step 30: Fill with cooked chicken, cheese, and onion.
Step 31: Roll, placing seam side down.
Step 32: Pour 2 cups of the sauce over enchiladas.
Step 33: Sprinkle with crumbled queso fresco and bake until warm, about 15 minutes.
Step 34: Serve with a dollop of crema or sour cream and your favorite side dish.
zh: 步驟1：烤辣椒辣椒預熱肉雞。
步驟2：選擇堅固的辣椒，沒有皺紋進行烘烤。
步驟3：徹底洗滌。
步驟4：將辣椒均勻地放在襯有箔紙的餅乾板上。
步驟5：放在肉雞下。
步驟6：密切關注它們，因為皮膚會在幾分鐘內起泡並變黑。
步驟7：在5分鐘後轉動辣椒，使所有側面均勻地起泡。
步驟8：完成後，胡椒皮應均勻泡得均勻，大部分為黑色。
步驟9：將烤胡椒放在塑料袋中，用廚房毛巾蓋上蓋子，然後冷卻時，擦黑皮膚。
步驟10：撕開並拉出種子吊艙和莖。
步驟11：在攪拌機中調味醬將辣椒，麵粉和Suero或酪乳的一半混合在一起，然後混合直至奶油。
步驟12：將混合物倒入中煎鍋中，並將中等熱量放在溫暖下。
步驟13：添加其他Suero或酪乳並攪拌。
步驟14：味道和調味鹽，通常約2茶匙。
步驟15：如果醬汁太辣，請加入杯子或酸奶油並攪拌。
步驟16：如果醬汁太厚，請加水，直到達到所需的稠度。
步驟17：雞肉（可選）在鍋中，鍋裡有足夠的水覆蓋，將雞胸肉煮沸25分鐘，或直到果汁清除為止。
步驟18：排幹，冷和切碎。
步驟19：可選的節省時間：切碎一家商店買了烤肉店雞肉。
步驟20：在熱油中堆疊式玉米餅，直至變軟。
步驟21：在紙巾上排幹。
步驟22：一次浸入醬汁中，可以軟化玉米餅。
步驟23：將軟化的玉米餅放在單個餐盤上。
步驟24：煮熟的雞肉，奶酪和洋蔥。
步驟25：重複每份玉米粉圓餅的重複過程。
步驟26：烤箱風格的預熱烤箱至350度。
步驟27：將1杯醬汁放入未磨損的9 x 13英寸烤盤中。
步驟28：在熱油中炸玉米餅，直到變軟為止。
步驟29：瀝乾紙巾。
步驟30：填充煮熟的雞肉，奶酪和洋蔥。
步驟31：滾動，將接縫側向下放置。
步驟32：將2杯醬汁倒在辣醬玉米餅餡上。
步驟33：撒上碎的Queso壁畫，烘烤直至溫暖，大約15分鐘。
步驟34：與一團克馬或酸奶油和您最喜歡的配菜一起食用。

instructions.en:
Step 1: In a bowl, blend together the cream cheese, sour cream, chili powder, cumin, and garlic.
Step 2: Fold in the cheese, chicken, tomatoes with green chilies, green onion and cilantro into the cream cheese mixture.
Step 3: Divide mixture between the tortillas and top with lettuce.

步驟2：將奶酪，雞肉，綠色辣椒，綠洋蔥和香菜折疊成奶油奶酪混合物。
步驟3：將混合物與玉米餅之間的混合物和生菜之間。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat Oven 350 degrees:
Step 2: Clean chicken inside and out and pat dry.
Step 3: Combine olive oil, lemon juice, orange juice, garlic, honey, sage, curry, black pepper and turmeric in a small bowl and mix well.
Step 4: Rub chicken down with this mixture and stuff some of the garlic and sage under the skin of the chicken.
Step 5: Place in a baking pan and bake according to the size of your chicken. Let the skin become golden and beautiful.

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Scald the milks together in a heavy saucepan. Remove from the heat.
Step 2: Caramelize the sugar in a skillet over medium heat until it melts and turns brown. Slowly add the milks to the sugar, stirring constantly until the sugar dissolves.
Step 3: In a medium bowl, beat the egg substitute and egg yolk together until it is lemon-colored. Add the milk mixture, port, and vanilla and stir well.
Step 4: Pour the mixture into 6 custard cups and place them into a baking dish. Pour boiling water into the baking dish so that the water comes halfway up the sides of the cups. Place in the oven and bake until set, about 35 to 40 minutes.
Step 5: Remove the custard cups from the oven and cool completely in the refrigerator. When they are chilled, place a dessert plate on top of each custard cup and invert. Serve immediately.
Step 6: This recipe yields 6 servings.
Step 7: Serving size: 1/2 cup.
zh: 步驟1：將烤箱預熱至350度。在一個濃重的鍋中散佈奶牛。從火上移開。
步驟2：用中火將糖中的糖焦糖焦糖，直到融化並變成棕色。慢慢將奶中的奶中的奶油加入糖，不斷攪拌直至糖溶解。
步驟3：在一個中等大小的碗中，將雞蛋替代品和蛋黃一起打成檸檬色。加入牛奶混合物，端口和香草，攪拌均勻。
步驟4：將混合物倒入6杯杯中，然後將其放入烤盤中。將沸水倒入烤盤中，以便水倒在杯子的側面。放在烤箱中，烘烤直至凝固，約35至40分鐘。
步驟5：從烤箱中取出蛋ust杯，然後在冰箱中完全冷卻。冷藏後，將甜點盤放在每個蛋ust杯的頂部然後倒置。立即服務。
步驟6：此食譜可產生6份。
步驟7：服務尺寸：1/2杯。

Step 1: Heat the olive oil in a heavy pot, such as a Le Creuset, over medium-high heat.
Step 2: Add the onion, celery root, garlic, scallion tops, and leek confit.
Step 3: Saut until the onion softens, about 15 minutes.
Step 4: Add the apple, mustard, and rosemary, and cook for another couple of minutes.
Step 5: The mixture will be very aromatic.
Step 6: Add the remaining ingredients and bring to a low simmer.
Step 7: Cover and simmer for 40 minutes.
Step 8: Adjust seasoning if needed.
zh: 步驟1：用中火加熱重鍋中的橄欖油，例如Le Creuset。

instructions.en:
Step 1: In a medium saucepan, whisk together the cornstarch, cocoa powder, sugar salt, and salt.
Step 2: In a separate bowl, combine the milk and egg.
Step 3: Gradually pour the milk mixture into the saucepan, whisking until thoroughly mixed.
Step 4: Heat the mixture, stirring constantly, over medium heat until it boils. Cook for 1 minute, then remove from heat.
Step 5: Stir in butter and vanilla extract.
Step 6: Pour the pudding into the suitable molds rinsed with cold water (the pudding can be taken out more easily).
Step 7: Chill.
zh: 步驟1：在中鍋中，將玉米澱粉，可可粉，糖鹽和鹽攪拌在一起。
步驟2：在一個單獨的碗中，將牛奶和雞蛋混合。
步驟3：將牛奶混合物逐漸倒入鍋中，攪拌直至徹底混合。
步驟4：加熱混合物，用中火不斷攪拌直至沸騰。煮1分鐘，然後從火上取出。
步驟5：加入黃油和香草提取物。

步驟7：冷靜。

en: Step 1: Whisk together 3 tablespoons of walnut oil with lemon juice, minced shallot, salt and pepper to make a vinaigrette. Coat each goat cheese round with walnut oil and then the bread crumbs, patting the crumbs to adhere.
Step 2: Combine the greens and the walnuts in a large bowl. Add in enough of the vinaigrette and toss well. Adjust the seasoning and divide among two serving plates.

Step 3: Heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add in olive oil. When the oil is hot, add the goat cheese rounds. Cook until nicely browned, about 30 seconds. Turn and cook the other side. Do not allow it to burn or melt. Transfer the goat cheese to the plates, placing 2 or 3 atop each salad. Sprinkle the cheese with freshly ground pepper and garnish with grape wedges.

Step 1: Preheat oven to 350.
Step 2: Peel and chop sweet potatoes into 1 inch cubes.
Step 3: Spread peeled/cubed sweet potatoes out over a half sheet rimmed baking sheet. Coat with 2 tbs of olive oil and sprinkle of salt and pepper.
Step 4: Bake for 30-35 minutes until fork tender and browned.

Step 5: Meanwhile, heat 2 tbs olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the red onions, bell peppers, green onions and garlic and saute until tender and lightly golden about 5-6 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Step 6: Portion out sweet potato hashbrown cubes between ramekins. Make a nest indentation in the top of each ramekin filled with hashbrowns. Sprinkle grated sharp cheddar over the top of each ramekin. Crack an egg over each nested out spot.
Step 7: Bake at 425 for 5-6 minutes. If the hashbrowns have been refrigerated, bake until each yolk is set and white has turned white!

instructions.en:
Step 1: In a small mixing bowl or blender, combine all of the ingredients for the balsamic marinade except for the lemon juice (balsamic vinegar, apple cider vinegar, 1 tbsp grapeseed oil, honey, dried dill, herbs de provence, salt and pepper).
Step 2: Whisk or blend until oil and vinegar are well incorporated and no longer separate.
Step 3: Place salmon fillet in a baking dish (I use a small casserole dish). Pour the marinade over the salmon and allow it to marinate for at least 15 minutes (or up to 24 hours covered in the refrigerator).
Step 4: Turn your oven on high broil.
Step 5: Just before putting the salmon in the oven, drizzle the lemon juice over the fish.
Step 6: Bake for 10 to 12 minutes on the top rack or until salmon is glazed, browned and sizzling.
Step 7: While the salmon is baking, prepare the asparagus.
Step 8: Wash the asparagus and cut off the bottom inch and a half of each stalk and discard.
Step 9: Spread the asparagus on in a large skillet. Drizzle the grapeseed oil over the asparagus and spread the oil on the asparagus with your hands so that all stalks are completely coated.
Step 10: Sprinkle asparagus with desired amount of salt and pepper.
Step 11: Saute over medium heat for 5 minutes.
Step 12: Add the two tablespoons of vegetable stock and cover the skillet.
Step 13: Saute 4 minutes.
Step 14: Remove lid and add the minced garlic.
Step 15: Place cover back over the asparagus.
Step 16: Continue cooking an additional 3 to 5 minutes until asparagus is cooked but not too soft. Grate lemon zest over the top of the asparagus.
zh: 步驟1：在一個小的攪拌碗或攪拌機中，除了檸檬汁（香醋，蘋果醋，1湯匙葡萄籽油，蜂蜜，蜂蜜，幹蒔蘿，香草de provence，salt and Pepper）之外，將所有香脂醃料的所有成分混合在一起。
步驟2：攪拌或混合，直到油和醋被充分摻入並且不再分開。
步驟3：將鮭魚片放入烤盤中（我用小砂鍋菜）。將醃泡汁倒在鮭魚上，並允許其醃製至少15分鐘（或在冰箱中覆蓋24小時）。
步驟4：將烤箱打開高烤。
步驟5：就在將鮭魚放在烤箱中之前，將檸檬汁淋上魚。
步驟6：在頂部架子上烘烤10到12分鐘，或直到鮭魚被釉面，褐色和嘶嘶作響。
步驟7：鮭魚烘烤時，準備蘆筍。
步驟8：洗蘆筍，切斷每個莖的底部半英寸半，然後丟棄。
步驟9：將蘆筍撒在大煎鍋中。將葡萄籽油淋在蘆筍上，並用手將油撒在蘆筍上，以使所有莖都完全覆蓋。
步驟10：撒上所需量的鹽和胡椒粉。
步驟11：用中火炒5分鐘。
步驟12：添加兩湯匙蔬菜湯，並覆蓋煎鍋。
步驟13：炒4分鐘。
步驟14：取下蓋子，加入碎大蒜。
步驟15：將蓋子放回蘆筍上。
步驟16：繼續烹飪3至5分鐘，直到蘆筍煮熟，但不要太軟。烤檸檬皮在蘆筍的頂部。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350F. Grease and lightly flour 2 cupcake pans (24 cupcakes).
Step 2: To make the batter: In a small bowl, sift the cake flour and set aside. In a large bowl, on the medium speed of an electric mixer, cream the butter and sugar until very light and fluffy, about 5 minutes. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. In a small bowl, whisk together the red food coloring, cocoa, and vanilla. Add to the batter and beat well.
Step 3: In a measuring cup, stir the salt into the buttermilk. Add to the batter in three parts alternating with the flour. With each addition, beat until the ingredients are incorporated, but do not overbeat. In a small bowl, stir together the cider vinegar and baking soda. Add to the batter and mix well. Using a rubber spatula, scrape down the batter in the bowl, making sure the ingredients are well blended and the batter is smooth.
Step 4: Divide the batter among the prepared pans. Arrange the oven racks in the upper and lower thirds of the oven and bake the cupcakes, switching positions of the pans halfway through baking, until a tester comes out clean, about 20 minutes. Cool the cupcakes in the pan 10 minutes, then remove from the pan and cool completely on a rack before icing. To ice, mound about cup of frosting on top of each cupcake and use an icing spatula to make a swirl on top. If desired, decorate with colored sprinkles.
Step 5: Frosting
Step 6: Combine butter, salt, and cream cheese in mixer and beat on medium speed 2-3 minutes.
Step 7: Add sugar until just incorporated. Dont over mix. It should be thick but not fluffy.
Step 8: Add vanilla. If necessary, add milk to thin.
zh: 步驟1：將烤箱預熱至350F。油脂和輕輕的麵粉2杯蛋糕鍋（24杯蛋糕）。
步驟2：製作麵糊：在一個小碗中，篩選蛋糕麵粉並放在一旁。在一個大碗中，在電動攪拌機的中等速度下，將黃油和糖奶油奶油，直到非常輕巧，大約5分鐘。每次添加後一次加入一個雞蛋。在一個小碗中，將紅色食用色素，可可和香草攪拌均勻。添加到麵糊中，打得很好。
步驟3：在測量杯中，將鹽攪拌到酪乳中。與麵粉交替的三個部分中添加到麵糊中。每次添加時，都會打直到成分合併，但不要過度損壞。在一個小碗中，將蘋果醋和小蘇打攪拌在一起。加入麵糊並充分混合。使用橡膠刮刀，將麵糊刮下來，確保成分混合且麵糊光滑。
步驟4：將麵糊分開在準備好的平底鍋之間。將烤箱架放在烤箱的上和下三分之一中，然後烘烤紙杯蛋糕，在烘烤的一半切換鍋的位置，直到測試儀乾淨，約20分鐘。在鍋中冷卻蛋糕10分鐘，然後從鍋中取出，然後在糖霜之前完全在架子上冷卻。要冰上，在每個紙杯蛋糕的頂部大約有一杯糖霜，然後用糖霜刮刀在頂部旋轉。如果需要，請用彩色灑水裝飾。
步驟5：糖霜
步驟6：將黃油，鹽和奶油奶酪混合在攪拌機中，並以中等速度進行2-3分鐘。
步驟7：加糖直至剛摻入。不要過度混合。它應該厚，但不要蓬鬆。
步驟8：添加香草。如有必要，將牛奶添加到薄中。

Step 2: Add the mint leaves and serve cold.

instructions.en:
Step 1: Set two racks in the middle of the oven. Preheat to 375F.
Step 2: In a food processor, or bowl of an electric mixer, thoroughly mix the flour, cocoa, baking soda and powder, salt, and sugar. While pulsing, or on low speed, add the butter, and then the egg. Continue processing or mixing until dough comes together in a mass.
Step 3: Take rounded teaspoons of batter and place on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet approximately two inches apart. (I started off with loonie sized chunks of dough which was too big. Its more like the size of a quarter. Remember, youre aiming for 50 to 60 of these individual wafers!) With moistened hands, slightly flatten the dough. Bake for 9 minutes, rotating once for even baking. Set baking sheets on a rack to cool.
Step 4: To make the cream, place butter and shortening in a mixing bowl, and at low speed, gradually beat in the sugar and vanilla. Turn the mixer on high and beat for 2 to 3 minutes until filling is light and fluffy.
Step 5: To assemble the cookies, in a pastry bag with a 1/2 inch, round tip, pipe teaspoon-size blobs of cream into the center of one cookie. Place another cookie, equal in size to the first, on top of the cream. Lightly press, to work the filling evenly to the outsides of the cookie. (I dont think its entirely necessary to use a pastry bag. You could just spoon some icing on and squeeze between two wafers.) Continue this process until all the cookies have been sandwiched with cream.
zh: 步驟1：在烤箱的中間設置兩個架子。預熱至375F。
步驟2：在食品加工機或一碗電動攪拌機中，將麵粉，可可，小蘇打和粉，鹽和糖徹底混合。在脈動或低速時，加入黃油，然後加黃油。繼續加工或混合，直到麵團成質量為止。
步驟3：拿起圓形的麵糊茶匙，然後放在羊皮紙襯裡的烤盤上，相距約兩英寸。 （我從Loonie大小的麵團開始，這太大了。它更像是四分之一的大小。請記住，您的目標是將50至60個單獨的晶圓的瞄準！烘烤9分鐘，旋轉一次以進行烘烤。將烤盤放在架子上冷卻。
步驟4：要製作奶油，將黃油放在攪拌碗中，並以低速逐漸攪拌，逐漸攪拌糖和香草。將攪拌機打開高，然後攪拌2至3分鐘，直到餡料輕巧蓬鬆。
步驟5：將餅乾組裝在一個帶有1/2英寸的糕點袋中，圓形尖端，管道茶匙大小的奶油液體進入一個餅乾的中心。將另一個餅乾尺寸與第一個相等的餅乾放在奶油頂部。輕輕按下，將填充物均勻地填充到餅乾的外部。 （我認為使用糕點袋不是完全必要的。您可以在兩個晶圓之間倒入一些糖霜並擠壓。）繼續此過程，直到所有餅乾都夾在奶油中為止。

Step 1: Soak the quartered cabbage in the brine solution for 4 hours, weighing the cabbage down with a heavy plate.
Step 2: Remove and drain.
Step 3: Place garlic cloves, rice, fermented shrimp, fish sauce, sugar, chilly paste and chilly flakes in a food processor and zap to a smooth paste.
Step 4: Stir in spring onions.
Step 5: Stuff the cabbage with the paste, making sure to stuff in between the individual leaves and coating every inch of it.

instructions.en:
Step 1: Soak the dates in hot water while you get the rest of the ingredients and start on step 2 (about 5 minutes).
Step 2: The water should be hot to the touch but not hot enough to burn you.
Step 3: Process the almonds in a food processor until coarse almond meal is formed.
Step 4: Add the pecans and process until they are ground up into a coarse meal as well.
Step 5: Drain the dates and use your hand to squeeze out excess water.
Step 6: Add the drained dates, cocoa powder, vanilla extract, agave nectar, and salt to the food processor.
Step 7: Process until a smooth paste forms.
Step 8: Use a tablespoon measure to help you form the truffles.
Step 9: Pack a heaping tablespoon of the mixture into the tablespoon measure really pack it in there.
Step 10: Use your fingers to slide the half-rounded ball out of the tablespoon measure, and then use your hands to form a tightly packed ball of truffle goodness.
Step 11: Be gentle with them I found that they fall apart if you try to roll them into balls.
Step 12: It is best to squish them with your hand into perfect little spheres.
Step 13: Form truffles until you use up all the mixture.
Step 14: The last bit that was not enough for a truffle went straight into my mouth.
Step 15: :) If you choose to, gently roll the truffles in the toppings of your choice.
Step 16: I had some turtle crunch sprinkles, unsweetened coconut flakes, and extra cocoa powder.
Step 17: The cocoa powder definitely gives the the truffles an extra dark chocolate kick, so if you dont like the bitterness of the cocoa powder then dont use that as a topping.
zh: 步驟1：在獲得其餘成分時將日期浸泡在熱水中，然後從步驟2開始（大約5分鐘）。
步驟2：水應該很熱，但不足以燃燒您。
步驟3：處理食品加工機中的杏仁，直到形成粗杏仁粉為止。
步驟4：添加山核桃並加工，直到它們也被磨成粗餐為止。
步驟5：排幹日期，用手擠出多餘的水。
步驟6：將排水日期，可可粉，香草提取物，龍舌蘭花蜜和鹽加入食品加工機。
步驟7：處理直到形成光滑的糊狀。
步驟8：使用湯匙尺寸來幫助您形成鬆露。
步驟9：將一湯匙混合物打包到湯匙尺寸中，將其包裝在其中。
步驟10：用手指從湯匙尺寸中滑出半獨奏的球，然後用手形成一個緊緊的松露良好球。
步驟11：對他們溫柔，我發現如果您試圖將它們滾入球，它們會崩潰。
步驟12：最好用手將它們擠成完美的小球。
步驟13：形成鬆露，直到使用所有混合物。
步驟14：不足以讓松露的最後一點直接進入我的嘴裡。
步驟15：:)如果您選擇，請輕輕地將鬆露滾動在您選擇的澆頭中。
步驟16：我有一些烏龜緊縮的灑水，未加糖的椰子片和額外的可可粉。
步驟17：可可粉肯定會給松露帶來多餘的黑巧克力踢，因此，如果您不喜歡可可粉的苦味，那就不要將其用作澆頭。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Add butter, garlic, onion and cauliflower to a large pot and saute for 5 minutes until cauliflower starts to brown.Add flour, chicken bouillon, ground mustard, paprika, salt and mix well, then add 2 cups milk and stir.
Step 2: Reduce heat and boil for 10 minutes, cauliflower should be soft.Add to a blender and blend until smooth.
Step 3: Transfer back to the pot and add the rest of the milk.
Step 4: Add parmesan cheese, cheddar cheese and stir until melted.When cheese is melted and its heated through, serve in bowls and top with bacon, croutons and extra cheese.
zh: 步驟1：將黃油，大蒜，洋蔥和花椰菜加到大鍋中，然後炒5分鐘，直到花椰菜開始變成棕色。 Add麵粉，雞肉bouillon，碎芥末，芥末醬，辣椒粉，鹽，鹽，然後加入2杯牛奶並攪拌。
步驟2：減少熱量並煮沸10分鐘，花椰菜應變軟。添加到攪拌機上並攪拌直至光滑。
步驟3：轉回鍋並加入其餘的牛奶。
步驟4：加入帕爾瑪奶酪，切達干酪奶酪，攪拌直至融化。當奶酪融化並加熱時，將其放入碗裡，並在碗裡搭配培根，麵包屑和額外的奶酪。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat the oven to warm or 170 degrees.
Step 2: Bring a small saute pan or small omelet pan to a warm.
Step 3: Saute the veggies using the olive oil starting with the shallot and garlic, adding the mushrooms until they are tender.
Step 4: Toss in the tomatoes and spinach and remove the pan from the heat.
Step 5: Pour a layer of the egg into a small omelet pan or small saute pan.
Step 6: As the egg starts to cook run a spatula around the edge to loosen the egg.
Step 7: Once the egg is almost cooked (slightly runny on the top) sprinkle half the basil, cheese, and sauteed veggies on to one side of the egg.
Step 8: Gently fold the egg over the filling.
Step 9: Slide the omelet onto a small oven safe plate and put it in the oven.
Step 10: Repeat for the second omelet!
zh: 步驟1：將烤箱預熱至溫暖或170度。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350. Melt 6 tbsp. butter in a medium saucepan over low heat. Add flour and cook, stirring constantly, for about 4 minutes.
Step 2: Stir in cayenne and season to taste with salt and pepper. Whisk in hot milk, 1/2 cup at a time, and cook, stirring, until sauce thickens. Reduce heat to low and stir in 2 cups of cheese. Cook, stirring, until cheese melts, about 2 minutes.
Step 3: Combine pasta and sauce in a large bowl, and season with salt. Sprinkle 1/2 cup cheese over the bottom of a buttered 8" 11" baking dish. Place one-third of the pasta in the baking dish, top with 1/2 cup of cheese, then repeat, layering pasta and cheese, ending with cheese, making three layers in all.
Step 4: Pour cream over assembled macaroni and cheese. Melt remaining butter in a skillet. Add bread crumbs, coat with melted butter, and sprinkle over macaroni and cheese.
Step 5: Bake until crust is golden, about 30 minutes. Allow to rest for 15 minutes before serving.
zh: 步驟1：將烤箱預熱至350。熔體6湯匙。在中型鍋中用低火黃油。加入麵粉並煮，不斷攪拌約4分鐘。
步驟2：攪拌cayenne，然後調味以搭配鹽和胡椒粉調味。一次用熱牛奶攪拌，一次1/2杯，煮，攪拌，直到醬汁變稠。將熱量降低至低溫，然後加入2杯奶酪。煮，攪拌，直到奶酪融化，大約2分鐘。
步驟3：將麵食和醬汁混合在一個大碗中，然後加鹽調味。將1/2杯奶酪撒在黃油8“ 11”烤盤的底部。將麵食的三分之一放在烤盤中，上面放上1/2杯奶酪，然後重複，分層意大利面和奶酪，以奶酪結尾，總共製作三層。
步驟4：將奶油倒在裝配的通心粉和奶酪上。在煎鍋中融化剩餘的黃油。加入麵包屑，塗上融化的黃油，然後撒在通心粉和奶酪上。
步驟5：烘烤直到地殼變成金黃色，大約30分鐘。上菜前允許休息15分鐘。

Step 1: In a small saucepan over medium-high heat, stir together mirin, vinegar, soy sauce, honey, ginger and wasabi to taste. (Add the wasabi incrementally, tasting as you go.)
Step 2: Bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium and cook, stirring occasionally, until glaze thickens slightly, about 5-10 minutes. Remove from the heat.
Step 3: Preheat oven to 425F.
Step 4: Lightly coat an oven-proof skillet with olive oil and heat on medium-high.
Step 5: Season the salmon with a little kosher salt & fresh cracked pepper.
Step 6: When the oil is hot and begins to shimmer, add the salmon, skin side up.
Step 7: Sear, without moving it around for 3-4 minutes. Turn the salmon over, skin side down. Brush some of the glaze onto the salmon and then place the skillet of salmon into the oven for about 4 minutes.
Step 8: Spoon the remainder of the sauce over the salmon and serve hot.

步驟2：燒開。將熱量降低至中等，煮熟，偶爾攪拌，直到釉略微增厚，約5-10分鐘。從火上移開。
步驟3：預熱烤箱至425F。
步驟4：用橄欖油輕輕塗上防烤箱的煎鍋，並在中高。
步驟5：用少許猶太鹽和新鮮的胡椒粉調味鮭魚。
步驟6：當油熱並開始閃爍時，加入鮭魚，皮膚一面。
步驟7：燒焦，不移動3-4分鐘。將鮭魚翻過來，皮膚一側向下。將一些釉刷到鮭魚上，然後將鮭魚的煎鍋放入烤箱中約4分鐘。
第8步：將剩餘的醬汁倒在鮭魚上，然後熱。

en: Step 1: Cook onion and celery in 4 tablespoons butter over moderately low heat, until tender and transfer to a bowl. Stir in crab and bread crumbs.
Step 2: In a small bowl whisk together mayonnaise, seafood seasoning, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, parsley, and salt and pepper to taste and stir into crab mixture until combined well.
Step 3: Line a baking sheet with wax paper. Form crab mixture into 6 flattened rounds. Chill crab cakes, covered with plastic wrap, at least 1 hour.

Step 4: Heat 1 tablespoon butter over moderate heat until foam subsides and cook half of crab cakes until golden brown, about 2 to 3 minutes on each side. Cook remaining cakes in remaining tablespoon butter in same manner.

Step 5: Fill a medium sized sauce pan half way with water. Add 1/2 teaspoon of white vinegar (this is optional but the vinegar helps hold the egg together). Bring to a gentle boil and carefully add eggs (1-2 at a time works best). Poach eggs for 2-3 minutes or until yolk has set to your preference. Remove eggs one at a time with a slotted spoon.
Step 6: Assemble: Layer ingredients as follows: English muffin, crab cakes (1 each muffin), eggs, Hollandaise sauce.

Step 5: Place the scallops flat-side down in the hot pan.
Step 6: Don't overcrowd the pan, or the pan won't stay hot enough to give the scallops a good sear.
Step 7: If you have a lot of scallops, it's better to work in batches.
Step 8: Once you've placed the scallops in the pan, don't touch them.
Step 9: (Let them do their thing!) If you give in to the temptation to move the scallops around the pan, all you'll be doing is preventing them from forming the nice brown crust that you want.
Step 10: Because of variations in scallop thickness, pan temperatures and so on, it's not easy to pinpoint an exact cooking time.
Step 11: But after a couple of minutes, it's OK to peek underneath.
Step 12: If you see a nice, caramel-colored crust on the underside, they're ready to flip.
Step 13: Plate your salad and place 4 scallops on top.
Step 14: Scallops start to turn rubbery if you wait too long to serve them, so get them on the plate right away.
Step 15: And be sure to serve them with the beautiful caramel-colored crust facing up.

Step 6: The exact amount of water you need will depend on the amount of humidity in the air and therefore in the flour.
Step 7: Once finished, turn the dough out onto a piece of plastic wrap.
Step 8: Form the dough into a disk, and refrigerate 30 minutes before rolling it out.
Step 9: You want that flour to relax and the butter to be nice and cold that will ensure you have a nice flaky crust.
Step 10: Meanwhile, boil a pot of water large enough to fit the stalks of asparagus.
Step 11: Trim the ends of your asparagus making sure they will fit nicely into your quiche pan, arranged like the spokes in a bicycle wheel with the ends touching in the middle.
Step 12: Place in boiling water, and blanch for 2-3 minutes.
Step 13: Remove from boiling water and place in an ice bath to stop the cooking and keep the color nice and vibrant green.
Step 14: Set aside.
Step 15: Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Step 16: On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out into a circle a few inches larger than your quiche or pie pan.
Step 17: Fold the dough back up over the rolling pin if needed, to gently lift the crust into the dish.
Step 18: Once the dough is neatly into the pan, make sure it is smoothly tucked into the corners.
Step 19: Trim excess crust from the edges leaving about a 1 border.
Step 20: Fold the excess dough under itself, making sure not to fold it over the edge of the pan, to ensure a nice even border.
Step 21: Crimp the dough between your fingers to make little pinches.
Step 22: Poke a few fork holes in it to allow the steam to escape, this will prevent a soggy bottom crust.
Step 23: Blind bake the crust for 5 minutes.
Step 24: This will prevent all of the custard from getting absorbed into the crust making it soggy.
Step 25: Remove crust from oven and sprinkle with Havarti with Dill cheese. Set aside.
Step 26: Increase oven temperature to 375 degrees.
Step 27: In a large bowl, combine eggs, heavy cream, and milk and whisk thoroughly. Pour egg mixture gently over the cheese mixture.
Step 28: Place asparagus stalks, tips pointing outwards into a spoke pattern like on a bicycle wheel, making sure the ends come together in the middle.
Step 29: Bake 40 minutes.
Step 30: Check to make sure the crust isnt getting too brown.
Step 31: If it is, loosely drape a piece of foil over the top, making sure you dont lay it on the actual custard mixture in the middle.
Step 32: Bake 10-12 minutes longer.
Step 33: To test doneness, slide a butter knife under the edge of one of the asparagus stalks.
Step 34: The knife should come out clean.
Step 35: It should be moist after all the quiche is moist, but it should be free of egg mixture.
Step 36: If not, put it back in the oven with your tent foil on top for 3-4 more minutes.

instructions.en:
Step 1: Place 200g of ground pork in a large mixing bowl.
Step 2: If preferred, pork may be substituted with ground chicken.
Step 3: Add 1 teaspoon of sea salt, 1 teaspoon of fine sugar, add 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper, 2 teaspoons of light soy sauce, 2 teaspoons of sesame oil and 1 tablespoon of Shaoxing Huatiao wine.
Step 4: Place 100g of canned water chestnuts in a chopper/blender.
Step 5: Chop the water chestnuts to small pieces.
Step 6: Add the chopped water chestnuts to the pork mixture.
Step 7: If preferred, use spinach or cabbage in place of water chestnuts.
Step 8: Add 2 to 3 tablespoons of finely chopped scallions or spring onions to the pork mixture.
Step 9: Combine all the filling ingredients well.
Step 10: Thaw the dumpling wrappers if they are frozen.
Step 11: Keep them well covered until they are ready to be used.
Step 12: Dust a dish generously with flour.
Step 13: This will hold the dumplings once they are made.
Step 14: Dust the table generously with flour.
Step 15: Carefully separate the sheets of dumpling wrappers and lay them on the table.
Step 16: Fill each wrapper with about 1.5 teaspoons of the prepared pork filling.
Step 17: Prepare a bowl of water.
Step 18: Dip finger into the water and lightly wet the rim of each dumpling wrapper.
Step 19: Bring the dumpling wrapper together till the opposite ends meet.
Step 20: Gently push the filling into the wrapper and pinch the top tip of the dumpling wrapper to seal it.
Step 21: From the centre of the dumpling, fold a pleat on ONE side and bring it to the other side of the dumpling.
Step 22: Fold towards the centre of the dumpling.
Step 23: Pinch to seal it.
Step 24: Repeat and create a 2nd pleat.
Step 25: Be mindful to pinch tight to seal the dumpling well.
Step 26: Repeat and create a 3rd pleat.
Step 27: Each side should have 3 pleats.
Step 28: Repeat the same pleating on the other end of the dumpling.
Step 29: Always ensure that the pleats face the centre of the dumpling.
Step 30: Place all prepared dumplings in a well floured dish ensuring that they do not touch each other.
Step 31: Set aside till ready to cook.
Step 32: They can also be frozen at this stage.
Step 33: To cook the potstickers, add 2 to 3 tablespoons of vegetable oil to a very hot frying pan.
Step 34: The potstickers should be cooked in at least 2 batches.
Step 35: When the oil is hot, add the dumplings ensuring that the flat surfaces face down.
Step 36: Pan fry till the bottoms of the dumplings are a nice golden brown.
Step 37: Add 1/3 cup of water to the pan.
Step 38: Cover the pan immediately and let the steam cook the dumplings for 4 to 5 minutes.
Step 39: Once the water has evaporated, remove the cover and let the dumplings sit in the hot pan for another minute for its base to crisp up again.
Step 40: These are now Chinese potstickers.
Step 41: Gently transfer the potstickers to a plate.
Step 42: Serve immediately.
Step 43: These Chinese potstickers are best served with a vinegar dip made with balsamic or black chinese vinegar and thinly sliced ginger.
Step 44: Soy sauce, chili oil or sesame oil may also be added to the dipping sauce.
zh: 步驟1：將200克的豬肉放在一個大攪拌碗中。
步驟2：如果首選，豬肉可以用碎雞代替。
步驟3：加1茶匙海鹽，1茶匙的細糖，加入1/2茶匙黑胡椒粉，2茶匙淡醬油，2茶匙芝麻油和1湯匙shaoxing shaoxing huatiao葡萄酒。
步驟4：將100克罐頭栗子放入切碎機/攪拌機中。
步驟5：將栗子切成小塊。
步驟6：將切碎的水栗子加到豬肉混合物中。
步驟7：如果首選，請使用菠菜或白菜代替栗子。
步驟8：將2至3湯匙切碎的蔥或蔥加入豬肉混合物。
步驟9：將所有填充成分都很好地結合在一起。
步驟10：如果凍結了餃子包裝紙。
步驟11：保持覆蓋良好，直到準備好使用。
步驟12：用麵粉慷慨地將盤子撒上。
步驟13：製作餃子後將容納餃子。
步驟14：用麵粉慷慨地將桌子除塵。
步驟15：小心地將餃子包裝紙的床單分開，然後放在桌子上。
步驟16：用大約1.5茶匙準備的豬肉餡料填充每個包裝紙。
步驟17：準備一碗水。
步驟18：將手指浸入水中，將每個餃子包裝紙的邊緣輕輕弄濕。
步驟19：將餃子包裝紙放在一起，直到相反的生命達成。
步驟20：將餡料輕輕推入包裝紙中，然後捏住餃子包裝器的頂端以密封它。
步驟21：從餃子的中心，在一側折疊褶皺，然後將其帶到餃子的另一側。
步驟22：朝向餃子的中心折疊。
步驟23：捏密封。
步驟24：重複並創建第二個褶皺。
步驟25：請注意緊緊地密封餃子。
步驟26：重複並創建第三個褶皺。
步驟27：每一側都應有3個褶皺。
步驟28：在餃子的另一端重複相同的褶皺。
步驟29：始終確保褶皺面對餃子的中心。
步驟30：將所有準備好的餃子放入飽滿麵粉的菜餚中，以確保它們不會彼此接觸。
步驟31：放在一邊直到準備做飯。
步驟32：在此階段，它們也可以凍結。
步驟33：要煮鍋爐，將2至3湯匙植物油加入非常熱的煎鍋中。
步驟34：應至少2批煮熟的鍋。
步驟35：當油熱時，添加餃子，以確保平坦的表面面朝下。
步驟36：Pan Fry直到餃子的底部是一個漂亮的金黃色。
步驟37：在鍋中加1/3杯水。
步驟38：立即蓋上鍋，讓蒸汽煮4至5分鐘。
步驟39：一旦水蒸發，卸下蓋子，然後讓餃子坐在熱鍋中待另一分鐘，以使其底座再次清脆。
步驟40：這些現在是中國的陶藝家。
步驟41：輕輕地將Pottickers轉移到板上。
步驟42：立即服務。
步驟43：這些中國陶器最好配有香醋或黑色中國醋製成的醋蘸醬，並切成薄片的薑。
步驟44：醬油，辣椒油或芝麻油也可以添加到蘸醬中。

Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 In a large Dutch oven, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Step 2: Add bacon and saut for 2-3 minutes until cooked.
Step 3: Remove bacon with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Step 4: Dry beef with a paper towel so it will brown better.
Step 5: Increase heat to medium high and add beef to the bacon fat.
Step 6: Cook for 4-5 minutes until the outside has browned.
Step 7: Remove beef with a slotted spoon and set aside in a separate dish.
Step 8: Return heat to medium.
Step 9: Saut carrots, garlic, onions, parsley thyme and bay leaves for 2-3 minutes.
Step 10: Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside in a separate dish.
Step 11: Add pearl onions and mushroom to Dutch oven and saut until onions begin to brown and mushrooms become tender.
Step 12: Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside in the reserved bacon dish.
Step 13: Add beef back to the pot and dust with one tablespoon of flour.
Step 14: Toss to coat and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Step 15: Place in the preheated oven for 4-5 minutes.
Step 16: This will add a nice coating to the beef.
Step 17: Remove pot from the oven and place back on the stove top.
Step 18: Add red wine and deglaze the pan.
Step 19: Pour in beef broth and bring to a simmer over medium heat.
Step 20: Add carrot, onion and spice mixture to the pot, reduce heat and simmer covered for one hour.
Step 21: After one hour add pearl onions, mushrooms and bacon to the pot.
Step 22: Continue to simmer until beef is tender, about an additional 30 minutes.
Step 23: With a slotted spoon remove solids and set aside.
Step 24: Increase heat and bring sauce to a rapid boil.
Step 25: In a small bowl mix together remaining tablespoon of flour with two tablespoons of sauce.
Step 26: Stir until smooth and no lumps remain.
Step 27: Add mixture to the pot and stir constantly until sauce thickens.
Step 28: Remove bay leaves and thyme sprigs, discard.
Step 29: Add solids back to the pot and stir to coat evenly.
Step 30: Serve warm over a bed of egg noodles or rice.

instructions.en:
Step 1: With the tip of a small sharp knife, poke holes in the leg of lamb about 1 1/2-inch deep.
Step 2: Into each hole, stuff one slice of garlic.
Step 3: Rub the leg of lamb all over with olive oil, parsley and rosemary.
Step 4: Season well with Kosher salt and black pepper.
Step 5: Heat oven to 425 degrees.
Step 6: Place lamb in a roasting pan; roast 30 minutes.
Step 7: Reduce heat to 325 degrees, and baste the leg with any juices that have accumulated in the pan.
Step 8: Cook about 2 hours (total cooking time is about 20 minutes per pound), until an instant-read thermometer registers 130 degrees (medium) in the thickest part.
Step 9: Remove roast from oven and allow to rest 15 minutes.
Step 10: Transfer roast to a cutting board and let rest for 10 minutes.
Step 11: Carve in thin slices, parallel to the bone and serve.

Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 f. Brush a large baking sheet with a tablespoon of the olive oil. In a large, shallow dish combine the breadcrumbs, Parmesan, garlic powder, salt, pepper and 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Toss well with a fork until the oil is completely dispersed into the bread crumbs. Combine the eggs with 1 tablespoon of water in a medium bowl. Place the flour in a large resealable bag.

Step 2: Add half of the cauliflower florets to the bag with the flour, seal and shake to coat well. Remove the cauliflower to a fine mesh strainer and shake to remove excess flour. Place the floured cauliflower on a plate. Repeat with the remaining cauliflower.

Step 3: Working with a few pieces at a time. Add to the beaten egg. Using a fork, turn and toss the florets in the egg to completely coat. Transfer to the breadcrumb mixture and coat, pressing the crumbs into the florets, the help them adhere. Place on the oiled baking sheet, making sure you leave a little space between each florets so they crisp up really well. Repeat this step with the rest of the cauliflower. Spray the tops of the breaded florets lightly with cooking spray. Bake the cauliflower for 20 minutes, Flip the pieces over and continue baking for about 15 more minutes, until the cauliflower is crunchy on the outside and tender on the inside.

Step 4: While the cauliflower is baking, prepare the marinara. Pulse the undrained tomatoes in a food processor a few times until mostly broken down. Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil with the garlic and pepper flakes in a medium saucepan over medium heat until just sizzling. Add the tomatoes and simmer for about 10 minutes until the marinara thickens slightly and the flavors develop. Add 2 tablespoons of the fresh basil, season with salt and pepper if needed.
Step 5: When the cauliflower is done baking, transfer to a serving dish and sprinkle with the remaining basil. Serve with the marinara.

instructions.en:
Step 1: Wash and pat dry chicken thighs.
Step 2: In a sealable container, combine all marinade ingredients.
Step 3: Toss chicken in marinade, cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.In a Dutch oven, heat vegetable oil over medium high heat.
Step 4: Add onions and saut until tender.
Step 5: Add garlic and continue to saut until fragrant.Sprinkle onions and garlic with curry powder and stir to evenly coat.
Step 6: Add 1 tablespoon of water and cook for one minute, stirring constantly.Add chicken and marinade.
Step 7: Saut until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.If you want a thick curry add potatoes now, otherwise set aside.Sprinkle chicken with amchar masala, cumin and salt.
Step 8: Toss to coat.
Step 9: Pour in one cup of water and bring to a boil.Reduce heat, cover pot and simmer for 20 minutes.
Step 10: If you reserved the potatoes for a thinner curry, add them to the pot after twenty minutes.Continue to simmer for an additional twenty minutes until chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165 F and potatoes are cooked through.Serve warm with roti or rice.
zh: 步驟1：洗淨和拍幹雞大腿。

步驟9：倒入一杯水，煮沸。燃料，蓋子蓋子並小火煮20分鐘。

title.en: Oven Roasted Pears With Blackberry Sauce

en: Step 1: Pears:

Step 2: Pre-heat oven to 450 degrees Fahrenheit. Peel, core and quarter the pears. Melt the butter in a large casserole or baking dish (I used a 10 quart Le Creuset Dutch Oven), add the pears and cook over high heat for about ten minutes or until the pears are golden brown. Keep stirring them so they are evenly colored. Transfer the baking dish/casserole into the oven for 7-10 minutes until the pears are easily pierced with a paring knife. Remove the pears from the oven, transfer to a bowl, and let them cool to room temperature.
Step 3: Blackberry Sauce:

Step 4: Wash and dry the blackberries. (I use a salad spinner). Reserve cup of the berries for garnish. Put the 3 cups of blackberries, the powered sugar and the lemon juice in a food processor and pure. Pour the pure into a bowl and set aside.

Step 5: Pre-heat oven to 275 degrees Fahrenheit. Take a full size sheet pan and line it with a silpat mat. (If you dont have one, use parchment paper sprayed with Pam cooking spray) Get a large pastry bag with a star tip ready. Put the granulated sugar in a food processor and blitz into a very fine powder, about a minute. Transfer the superfine sugar to a bowl. Add the confectioners sugar and the chocolate to the food processor and process until the chocolate is pulverized into tiny flecks. Transfer to a bowl. Pour the egg whites into a mixing bowl and beat at slow speed with a whisk attachment until the egg whites begin to froth, then add the cream of tartar. Increase the speed to high and beat the whites until they form stiff peaks. Add the superfine sugar and continue to beat for another two minute

Step 6: Using a spatula, fill the pastry bag with the egg white mixture and pipe out the meringue kisses onto the lined baking sheet. As you finish squeezing out a dollop of egg white, gently push the star tip of the pastry bag into the dollop about inch and then quickly pull it away: that action gives the top a small point.

Step 7: When all the meringues are piped out, place the baking sheet in the oven for an hour-and-a half. Youre not baking the meringues, but simply drying out the egg whites. Theyre done when the meringue is hard to the touch. Remove the meringues from the oven and let cool to room temperature.
Step 8: To plate and serve, spoon several tablespoons of blackberry sauce into the center of a bowl, add 3 0r 4 pear quarters, several meringue kisses, and garnish with a few whole blackberries.

instructions.en:
Step 1: Wash the chicken with cold water and place in pot. Cover with water and bring to a simmer (do not boil or your broth won't be clear).
Step 2: Skim off bubbling foam as it forms. Add celery, carrots, onion, herbs, salt and pepper and continue to simmer for about 45 minutes.
Step 3: Pour soup through strainer and let cool. When broth has completely cooled, remove the chicken meat and skim off the fat and save for the matzo balls.
Step 4: In a mixing bowl, mix together 4 eggs and 4 tablespoons chicken fat (or vegetable oil). Stir in the matzo meal and salt. Add 1/4 selter water. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
Step 5: Form the matzo dough into teaspoon-size balls.
Step 6: Bring the chicken broth to a boil. Add the matzo balls, cover, and cook for 20 minutes.
Step 7: Serve immediately.
Step 8: Garnish with fresh dill or parsley.
zh: 步驟1：用冷水清洗雞肉，然後放入鍋中。用水蓋上，然後煮沸（不要煮沸，否則肉湯就不會清楚）。
步驟2：在形成時脫離冒泡的泡沫。加入芹菜，胡蘿蔔，洋蔥，草藥，鹽和胡椒粉，繼續煮約45分鐘。
步驟3：通過過濾器倒湯，冷卻。當肉湯完全冷卻後，取出雞肉，從脂肪中脫下雞肉，然後節省MATZO球。
步驟4：在一個攪拌碗中，將4個雞蛋和4湯匙雞肉（或植物油）混合在一起。加入發食餐和鹽。加1/4 selter水。覆蓋並冷藏至少1小時。
步驟5：將MATZO麵團形成茶匙大小的球。
第6步：將雞肉湯煮沸。加入MATZO球，蓋上蓋子，煮20分鐘。
步驟7：立即服務。
步驟8：用新鮮的蒔蘿或歐芹裝飾。

Step 1: In a large bowl, mix the first four ingredients together (flour, egg, salt and oil). Form a ball of dough using your hands, then let it rest for about 1 hour.

Step 1: Bring coconut milk and water just to a boil, then reduce heat to a low simmer.

en: Step 1: In a dish add about 1/2 cup whole wheat bread crumbs, a little salt and pepper. Coat the chicken lightly and place to the side.

Step 2: In a large saute pan, over medium high heat, add in just enough oil to coat the bottom of the pan. Brown the chicken on both sides. It should brown quickly so you don't over cook the chicken. Cook in batches then set the chicken aside.

Step 3: Once all the chicken is cooked and set aside you can start making the sauce. To the pan add another small drizzle of olive oil and add the sliced shallot. Cook until softened. Carefully add in the wine and allow to simmer for 5 minutes.
Step 4: Add in the broth, lemon juice and chicken. Simmer on low for 10 minutes. Add in some chopped fresh parsley, taste for salt and pepper.
Step 5: Serve over the al dente linguini and top with grated pecorino cheese.

instructions.en: Step 1: Pour 1 cup of coconut milk in a pot with 1 seasoning cube and allow to boil for a minute.Pour in your rice and peas in the boiling coconut milk and pour 2 cups of water and leave to boil till the rice and peas are soft on low heat.In a separate pot, season and bring the mackerel to boil in the rest of the coconut milk, curry powder and some water.Toss in the chopped onion, scotch bonnet peppers and garlic and allow to simmer on medium heat.Once the fish is cooked, add the corn starch to thicken the sauce and allow to simmer for 4 minutes on low heat.Serve with the rice and peas
instructions.zh: 步驟1：將1杯椰奶倒入一個帶1個調味料立方體的鍋中，然後煮沸一分鐘。在米飯和豌豆煮沸的椰奶中煮沸，然後倒2杯水，然後煮沸，直到米飯和豌豆在低溫下柔軟。在一個單獨的鍋中，調味，調味，然後將麥片煮成蜂蜜牛奶，並煮熟，煮熟的牛奶，cocion牛奶，cocon牛奶，curry cocion and cocter coctry coctry incot incot incot incot incot incot incot incot incot incot cocion coctry coctry coctry。辣椒和大蒜，並在中等熱量上慢火煮。一旦魚煮熟，加入玉米澱粉以使醬汁變稠，並在低溫下煮4分鐘。

Step 1: In a small bowl, cover dried mushrooms with warm water. Soak for 25 minutes, or until softened.
Step 2: Drain the mushrooms, and discard the soaking water. Chop finely.
Step 3: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
Step 4: Add farro, and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain and reserve.
Step 5: In a large skillet, over medium heat, heat the olive oil, and add onion, garlic, thyme, and mushrooms.
Step 6: Cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until onions are tender.
Step 7: Stir in 2 tablespoons of sherry vinegar, and continue cooking for 1 minute.
Step 8: Add chicken stock, and bring it to a boil.
Step 9: Stir in farro, and return to a boil.
Step 10: Lower the heat to a simmer, and cover with a tight fitting lid. Cook for 10 minutes.
Step 11: Add asparagus, and cook, covered, for an additional 10 minutes.
Step 12: Season with 1 tablespoon sherry vinegar, salt and pepper.

instructions.en:
Step 1: In a large plastic zippered bag, toss the Brussels sprouts, 3 pressed garlic cloves and 2 tablespoons Olive Oil.
Step 2: Empty the contents into a ovenproof dish and roast at 350 degrees for 40 minutes.
Step 3: While the Brussels sprouts are roasting, in a pan heat 1/4 cup olive oil.
Step 4: When the olive oil is heated through, saute a slice of bread until browned on both sides.
Step 5: Set aside.
Step 6: When the Brussels sprouts have finished roasting...
Step 7: In the same pan that you sauteed the bread, add the onion and saute for about 3 minutes.
Step 8: Do not let them get fully tender.
Step 9: Add the pancetta and heat through for an additional minute.
Step 10: Add the Brussels sprouts and heat through for an additional 3 minutes.
Step 11: Remove from heat.
Step 12: In a food processor, blend the bread and 1 - 2 cloves of garlic.
Step 13: Sprinkle on top of the Brussels sprouts mixture and finish by a last drizzle of Olive Oil!
zh: 步驟1：在一個大的塑料拉鍊袋中，將布魯塞爾芽菜，3個壓榨大蒜丁香和2湯匙橄欖油扔掉。
步驟2：將內容物倒入防烤箱中，並以350度烤40分鐘。
步驟3：當布魯塞爾芽菜在鍋中烘烤時，在鍋熱1/4杯橄欖油中。
步驟4：當加熱橄欖油時，將一片麵包炒至兩面都變成褐色。
步驟5：放在一邊。
第6步：布魯塞爾芽肉完成烘焙...
第7步：在炒麵包的同一鍋中，加入洋蔥，炒約3分鐘。
步驟8：不要讓它們完全嫩。
步驟9：添加培根並加熱一分鐘。
步驟10：添加布魯塞爾芽菜，再加熱3分鐘。
步驟11：從火上取出。
步驟12：在食品加工機中，將麵包和1-2個大蒜丁香混合。
步驟13：撒在布魯塞爾芽菜混合物的頂部，最後一塊橄欖油毛毛雨！

en: Step 1: Whisk the eggs.

Step 4: Heat some oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat. Grease the whole surface of the pan and then pour the oil in a cup. You’ll be reusing it.
Step 5: Pour the batter in the pan, using approximately ¼ cup for each crepe. Tilt the pan with a circular motion so that the batter coats the surface evenly.

Step 6: Cook the crepe for about 2 minutes until the bottom is light brown. Loosen with a spatula, turn and cook on the other side. Repeat the process until you use up all the batter. Makes about 8 crepes.

Step 8: Heat some 1 tbsp oil in a large saucepan.
Step 9: Add the chopped onion. Sauté until golden, then add the mushroom paste and corn.
Step 10: Add spices.
Step 11: Cook for 15 minutes ten add the chopped dill and parsley and cook for another 5 minutes.
Step 12: Let it cool for at least 10 minutes before assembling the crepes.
Step 13: Fill the crepes using about 1 ½ tbsp of filling / crepe.
Step 14: Mix last four ingredients and pour sauce over the vegetarian mushroom crepes.

Step 1: Soak cedar plank in water for 2 hours. Rinse salmon under cold water and pat dry with paper towels. Place a medium sauce pan over medium high heat and add bourbon or brandy. Use caution as the alcohol can ignite; never pour directly from the bottle. When alcohol is reduced and there is only a small amount left, add apple juice, brown sugar, and garlic. Continue to cook over medium high heat until reduced to about of the original volume (should be slightly thinner than syrup).
Step 2: Season salmon with salt and pepper on both sides, brush skin side with olive oil and place on cedar plank, skin side down. Place cedar plank on a medium high grill, or in a wood fired oven pre-heated to 500F near the fire. Use a probe thermometer to check the internal temperature of the salmon after 10 minutes, and every 5 minutes or so thereafter. Step 1: Heat a wok or skillet on med-high and add 1 tsp oil.
Step 2: To it add minced ginger and 1 tsp minced garlic.
Step 3: Saute until fragrant but not burnt.
Step 4: Add mushroom pieces.
Step 5: Cook until tender for 5-6 minutes.
Step 6: Keep mushrooms along with any juices aside in a bowl.
Step 7: Heat wok again add 1 tsp oil.
Step 8: To it add remaining garlic.
Step 9: Saute until fragrant and add all the vegetables.
Step 10: Stir it all together on high flame.
Step 11: Add salt, black pepper and splash of soy sauce.
Step 12: Toss to coat and let them cook for few more minutes until they get tender but not soft.
Step 13: You want veggies to be cooked but with a little crunch.
Step 14: Now add the cold already cooked rice and stir it so it all gets mixed together.
Step 15: Do with a gentle hand.
Step 16: Let the rice get warm at med- high flame.Add the remaining 1 tsp oil along with salt, black pepper and soy sauce.
Step 17: Add the mushrooms and tofu(if using).
Step 18: Mix it all together.
Step 19: Toss and taste.
Step 20: Garnish with chopped green parts of green onions and sesame seeds.

instructions.en:
Step 1: Combine the cream, milk, sugar, and coffee in a medium, heavy saucepan
Step 2: Bring to a gentle boil over medium heat; remove from the heat and set aside.
Step 3: Beat the egg yolks in a medium bowl.
Step 4: Whisk 1 cup of the hot cream into the egg yolks.
Step 5: Add the vanilla extract.
Step 6: Gradually add the egg mixture in a slow, steady stream, to the hot cream
Step 7: Cook over low heat, stirring constantly until slightly thickened, about 4-5 minutes.
Step 8: Remove from the heat and strain through a fine mesh strainer into a clean container.
Step 9: Cover with plastic wrap, pressing down against the surface to keep a skin from forming.
Step 10: Chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours.
Step 11: Pour the mixture into an ice cream machine and churn until frozen (according to the manufacturer's instructions).
Step 12: Transfer to plastic container and place in the freezer for a few hours before serving.
Step 13: Serving: take it out of the freezer for 5-10 minutes before serving, or longer, so it comes to the right scooping temperature.
Step 14: Easy suggestion: ice cream is best served in chilled glass or porcelain bowls. Scoop it with a hot, but dry, ice-cream spoon (soak it in boiling water, then wipe dry).

en: Step 1: Peel the shallot and cut into quarters. Make a small pouch out of aluminum foil (2 layers thick) and place inside the shallot and garlic. Coat with olive oil and a generous pinch of salt. Seal the pouch tightly and place in the oven (I recommend the toaster oven) at 400F for 30 minutes.
Step 2: Rinse and pick clean the Brussels sprouts. Cut each sprout in half, discarding any wilted outer leaves. Steam the Brussels sprouts until tender when pierced with a fork. Set aside.
Step 3: Rinse and drain the beans. Since, 1 can is a little too bean-heavy, save about 1/3 of the beans for something else.

Step 4: Slice the kielbasa on a steep bias into 1/4 slices. Heat 1 tsp. of olive oil in a large, heavy bottomed non-nonstick skillet over medium high heat. Arrange the kielbasa slices and fry until crispy on each side, about 3 minutes per side. Set aside on paper towels to drain.

Step 5: Add a generous tablespoon of good olive oil and keep the heat at medium high. Unwrap the garlic and shallot and smash them using the flat side of your knife. They should be very soft. Add them to the skillet and cook for about 1 minute.

Step 6: Add the mustard and cream to the skillet and stir to combine. Reduce the heat to medium low and add the brussels sprouts and beans (as many as you want to use). Toss everything together to coat, then season to taste with a generous amount of salt and black pepper.
Step 7: Plate the kielbasa on top of your brussels sprouts and beans in a large bowl to serve.

Step 1: Beat egg whites and only 2 tablespoons of sugar into stiff peaks.
Step 2: Mix the remaining sugar, flour, corn starch and baking powder in a separate bowl.
Step 3: Sift the flour and sugar mixture into the egg whites; stir very gently the mixture until smooth.
Step 4: Stir in the melted butter.
Step 5: Add half of the marzipan and amaretto, mix and combine.
Step 6: Pour the mixture into a suitable silicon mould (or regular round shape greased and sprinkled with bread crumbs).
Step 7: Sprinkle the top with the rest of the marzipan and sliced almonds.

en: Step 1: Begin by preheating oven to 160C for standard heating oven, 150C for fan-forced oven. I cant stress enough how important it is to have an efficient oven when it comes to baking. So if you intend to bake regularly, please invest in an oven thermometer so that you know the exact temperature your oven heats up to.
Step 2: Next, grease and line a 10 X 10 X 3 square baking pan or 11 round pan. Grease first, line with baking paper and then grease again.
Step 3: Add 5 large eggs to a large deep mixing bowl.
Step 4: Add 1 cup of sugar. Feel free to cut this amount by a tablespoon or two if your bananas are very very ripe. Ripe bananas have alot of sugar in them.
Step 5: Add 1 teaspoon of banana flavoured essence.
Step 6: Peel about 5 large bananas to get 400g of bananas. Use very ripe bananas. The stronger they smell, the better. You can cut the bananas into large pieces if they are too long for the bowl.
Step 7: Add the bananas to the egg and sugar mixture. Beat at low speed for one minute and then at maximum speed for 14 minutes.
Step 8: Let the machine whisk the mixture until it resembles whipped cream. If the mixture is still runny or wet, whisk some more. It should be white, stiff and non-dripping.
Step 9: While the egg and banana mixture is being whisked, prepare the dry ingredients.
Step 10: Sieve 2 & 1/2 cups of plain flour into a bowl. Add 1 & 1/2 teaspoon of baking powder. Add 1/2 teaspoon of bicarbonate of soda.
Step 11: Prepare 200g of vegetable oil about 2/3 cup and 1/4 cup.
Step 12: Transfer the whisked egg-banana mixture to a large bowl/pot if necessary.

Step 13: Add the flour mixture in 3 parts to the egg-banana mixture. Fold the flour mixture into the egg-banana mixture with your hands. Use large folding movements. Do this step in 3 parts. Dont add all the flour at one time.

Step 14: When the flour mixture has been folded into the egg-banana mixture, add the vegetable oil. And fold that in as well. If you have chopped walnuts, add them here too. I liked my cake with no nuts.
Step 15: Pour the batter into the greased and lined baking pan.

Step 16: Bake at a pre-heated oven of 160C for standard heating oven, 150C for fan-forced oven for 55 minutes or until the cake turns golden brown. A cake pick or satay stick should come out clean when placed into the centre of the cake. A cake pick or satay stick should come out clean when placed into the centre of the cake.
Step 17: Place a cake base or plate over the baking pan and invert the cake over. Peel the baking paper away from the cake.

Step 18: Use a cooling rack and invert the cake again. Let the cake cool on the cooling rack. If you are in a dry or cold environment, place a clean towel over the cake as it cools so that it would not dry out too quickly.
Step 19: Best served warm.

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray an 8 or 9-inch square pan with nonstick cooking spray. In a medium bowl, stir together flour and salt. Using an electric mixer, cream the butter, sugar and lemon zest at medium speed until light and fluffy. Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in 2 tablespoons lemon juice. Reduce speed to low and add flour mixture, mixing until incorporated. Spread batter into prepared pan and bake for about 30-35 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool on wire rack to room temperature.
Step 2: Meanwhile, make the glaze by combining the powdered sugar, lemon juice and zest in a small bowl. Spread over brownies and let set for at least 10 minutes before serving.

步驟2：與此同時，將糖粉，檸檬汁和熱皮混合在一個小碗中來製作釉料。分佈在布朗尼蛋糕上，並在食用前固定至少10分鐘。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Start with the Granita: Combine all ingredients into a medium saucepan over medium-low heat & simmer 10 to 15 minutes.
Step 2: Cool completely to room temp. Strain into a shallow airtight container; Cover & place in the freezer 2 hours.
Step 3: Take a fork & scrape the surface of the granita to form icy crystals (think of a snow cone).
Step 4: Place back in the freezer 1 hour. Repeat with taking a fork & scraping the surface to form more icy crystals.
Step 5: For the panna cotta: Heat the heavy cream, half-n-half & sugar in a saucepan over medium heat to dissolve the sugar; Remove from heat & scrape the seeds from the vanilla bean into the cream; Add the bean pod.
Step 6: Cover & let infuse 30 minutes
Step 7: Sprinkle the gelatin over the cold water in a medium-sized bowl & let stand 5 to 10 minutes.
Step 8: Remove vanilla bean from cream mixture & reheat over medium heat; Pour the warm cream over the gelatin; Stir until the gelatin is dissolved.
Step 9: Divide the Panna Cotta mixture into the 6 ramekins or large wine goblets; Chill until firm - 2 to 4 hours.
Step 10: Plating: Garnish the panna cotta with a couple of tablespoons of the granita with a fresh rosemary sprig.
zh: 步驟1：從格蘭尼塔（Granita）開始：將所有成分組合成中等鍋中的中等鍋中，並煮10至15分鐘。
步驟2：完全冷卻到房間溫度。將密閉的容器應布；蓋子和放置2小時的冰櫃。
步驟3：拿起叉子並刮擦格蘭尼塔的表面形成冰冷的晶體（想想雪錐）。
步驟4：1小時放回冰箱。重複採取叉子並刮擦表面以形成更多冰冷的晶體。
步驟5：對於胸衣：用中火加熱濃奶油，半半和糖，以溶解糖；從熱量中取出並將種子從香草豆中刮入奶油中；添加豆莢。
步驟6：蓋上並註入30分鐘
步驟7：將明膠撒在冷水中，在中型碗中撒上5到10分鐘。
步驟8：用中火從奶油混合物中取出香草豆；將溫暖的奶油倒在明膠上；攪拌直至明膠溶解。
步驟9：將胸部的棉布混合物分成6個小模子或大酒杯；冷卻直至牢固-2至4小時。
步驟10：電鍍：用新鮮的迷迭香小樹枝裝飾幾湯匙的盛裝棉布。

en: Step 1: Place 200g of ground pork in a large mixing bowl.
Step 2: If preferred, pork may be substituted with ground chicken.

Step 3: Add 1 teaspoon of sea salt, 1 teaspoon of fine sugar, add 1/2 teaspoon of ground black pepper, 2 teaspoons of light soy sauce, 2 teaspoons of sesame oil and 1 tablespoon of Shaoxing Huatiao wine.
Step 4: Place 100g of canned water chestnuts in a chopper/blender.
Step 5: Chop the water chestnuts to small pieces.
Step 6: Add the chopped water chestnuts to the pork mixture.
Step 7: If preferred, use spinach or cabbage in place of water chestnuts.
Step 8: Add 2 to 3 tablespoons of finely chopped scallions or spring onions to the pork mixture.
Step 9: Combine all the filling ingredients well.
Step 10: Thaw the dumpling wrappers if they are frozen.
Step 11: Keep them well covered until they are ready to be used.
Step 12: Dust a dish generously with flour.
Step 13: This will hold the dumplings once they are made.
Step 14: Dust the table generously with flour.
Step 15: Carefully separate the sheets of dumpling wrappers and lay them on the table.
Step 16: Fill each wrapper with about 1.5 teaspoons of the prepared pork filling.
Step 17: Prepare a bowl of water.
Step 18: Dip finger into the water and lightly wet the rim of each dumpling wrapper.
Step 19: Bring the dumpling wrapper together till the opposite ends meet.
Step 20: Gently push the filling into the wrapper and pinch the top tip of the dumpling wrapper to seal it.
Step 21: From the centre of the dumpling, fold a pleat on ONE side and bring it to the other side of the dumpling.
Step 22: Fold towards the centre of the dumpling.
Step 23: Pinch to seal it.
Step 24: Repeat and create a 2nd pleat.
Step 25: Be mindful to pinch tight to seal the dumpling well.
Step 26: Repeat and create a 3rd pleat.
Step 27: Each side should have 3 pleats.
Step 28: Repeat the same pleating on the other end of the dumpling.
Step 29: Always ensure that the pleats face the centre of the dumpling.
Step 30: Place all prepared dumplings in a well floured dish ensuring that they do not touch each other.
Step 31: Set aside till ready to cook.
Step 32: They can also be frozen at this stage.
Step 33: To cook the potstickers, add 2 to 3 tablespoons of vegetable oil to a very hot frying pan.
Step 34: The potstickers should be cooked in at least 2 batches.
Step 35: When the oil is hot, add the dumplings ensuring that the flat surfaces face down.
Step 36: Pan fry till the bottoms of the dumplings are a nice golden brown.
Step 37: Add 1/3 cup of water to the pan.
Step 38: Cover the pan immediately and let the steam cook the dumplings for 4 to 5 minutes.
Step 39: Once the water has evaporated, remove the cover and let the dumplings sit in the hot pan for another minute for its base to crisp up again.
Step 40: These are now Chinese potstickers.
Step 41: Gently transfer the potstickers to a plate.
Step 42: Serve immediately.
Step 43: These Chinese potstickers are best served with a vinegar dip made with balsamic or black chinese vinegar and thinly sliced ginger.
Step 44: Soy sauce, chili oil or sesame oil may also be added to the dipping sauce.
